OrgName.entry: VOLUNTEERING WITH HALLAM UNION, SHEFFIELD HALLAM UNIVERSITY UNION OF STUDENTS

Desc.entry: A student-led organisation which runs its own voluntary projects and placement opportunities within the community. Provides a wide range of training and personal development opportunities for students at Sheffield Hallam University.

Pubs.entry: In-house newsletter; Information pack; Project information pack

ContactName.entry: Ben West, Activities and Development Manager
